title: Lunar revel
body: Can i always buy Lunar revel skins or just during this sales???

replies.body: The only Lunar Revel skins that will be going into the legacy vault (and will not always be available) are Warring Kingdoms Tryndamere and Dragonblade Riven.

Why is that? I understand that the Jinx skin shouldn't be legacy because she only has 3 total, but both nidalee and katarina have a bunch of skins already so I don't get why their lunar revel skins won't go into the vault. Especially when riven's lunar revel skin is legacy and she has less skins than both nidalee and kat. Same thing with Leblanc and her new harrowing skin. Doesn't seem fair to me.
